languages.text: Base armour property: +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's Intelligence is more than 65.

languages.text: 基础护甲特性：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}。 如果装备者的智力高于65，获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。
